name: Super Auto Bets (GMTK 2022)
description:
A dice based gambling auto battler where you wager on your victory!

NOTE: The WebGL build works fine in Chrome but Firefox has trouble.

Extremely unfinished - the whole betting and between rounds shop systems are totally missing 😢. This would have been a more suitable project for a weeklong jam. 

Click to roll the dice and see how you score vs your opponent. 

  • Red dice are a standard D6
  • Blue dice are a 2D3 i.e. they only have the values 2, 4 and 6
  • Green dice are a 3D2 i.e. they only have the values 3 and 6
  • White dice are always worth 1

There are some systems for levelling up dice and adding bonus pips but they are also unfinished.

Expect a post-jam update at some point with more of the game in place.
